articles.content: After budget and entry-level smartphones, Infinix has now unveiled its first Android Smart TV in India. The company has now forayed into the Android TV market with its X1 Smart Tv Series, which has b… [+2220 chars]

articles.title: Huawei wireless headphones survey asks if the USB C cable in the box is necessary - gizmochina
articles.description: Huawei had recently launched a survey regarding an upcoming product. It was a survey for a new wireless headphones, although, the part that caught our attention is the question regarding whether users thought that the USB Type C cable was required in the box.…
